QuestData.Title: Evacuation Orders
QuestData.Description: A few farmers remain in the fields... some perilously close to the crumbling wall. I don't want any farmers pretending to be heroes. We will take care of this mantid swarm, and then they can return to their homes.$b$bMy Shado-Pan are too busy defending this town to organize evacuations. You want to prove yourself useful? Get those farmers out of harm's way.
QuestData.LogDescription: Evacuate the Blacksoil Family, the Spadepaw Family, the Greentill Family, and the Marlfur Family.
QuestData.CompletionText: Once these mantid are slain, we can get to work repairing the wall and restoring the town to its normal state.
QuestData.RewardText: A few stubborn ranchers want to make my job harder?$b$b<The Watch Commander sighs.>$b$bFine. I will rob no pandaren of his right to defend his land.
